Title: Clarifies the right of publicity
Summary: Clarifies the right of publicity including the definitions of who and what qualifies as a digital replica; provides guidance as to digital replicas that do not violate an individual or deceased individual's right to publicity; expands the statute of limitations for an action brought for violating an individual's right to publicity.
LawCode: Amd ยง50-f, Civ Rts L; amd ยง3, Chap 304 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to clarifying the right of publicity; and to amend chapter 304 of the laws of 2020 amending the civil rights law relating to establishing the right of publicity and to providing a right of action for unlawful dissemination or publication of a sexually explicit depiction of an individual, in relation thereto
